connect20/catagory_and_product_shipping.name: connect20/catagory_and_product_shipping

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/catagory_and_product_shipping.description: Perfect solution to add flat-rate shipping charges to any product/category specifically, that would work flawless regardless of the feature and functionality of your store.
